reviews.content: I call it broken because every time it is unlocked, it destroys the carefully designed icon layout. For example, the placed widgets will appear on other places or they becomes invisible or do not even open again.
Quite good but unfortunately sometimes the icon layout doesn’t adjust correctly.
Couple little issues but... it’s awesome.
Works but is super buggy 30 mins of setting up and over 20 resprings

Icons keep resetting into alphabetical order even without respring on iOS 13.5. 

Probably would be a pretty cool tweak otherwise.
Works amazing and feels native on 13.4 on my iPhone X
Still some compatibility issues with scale feature of home plus pro. Widgets gets skewed after a respring after adjusting scale in home plus. Dev please fix this!
Keeps telling me I need to associate my device to my account and doesn’t allow me to use it.
